meanings.definition: The act of making something uniform.
meanings.sent1: Uniforming is important in creating a neat appearance.
meanings.sent2: The uniforming of the team's attire made them look professional.
meanings.sent3: The uniforming of the cupcakes with identical decorations made them look like a set.
meanings.sent4: Her uniforming of the documents ensured they all followed the same format.
meanings.sent5: The uniforming of the colors in the painting brought harmony to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: Proper uniforming helps maintain consistency in the results.
meanings.sent2: The uniforming of rules across all departments streamlined operations.
meanings.sent3: The uniforming of the garden beds with matching flowers looked pleasing.
meanings.sent4: Her uniforming of the schedule brought order to the chaotic routine.
meanings.sent5: The uniforming of the fonts in the presentation enhanced readability.

meanings.definition: The action of standardizing or making consistent.
meanings.sent1: Uniforming of procedures ensures everyone follows the same steps.
meanings.sent2: The uniforming of measurements simplified the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The uniforming of the software interfaces made navigation easier.
meanings.sent4: Her uniforming of the report format made it easier to compare data.
meanings.sent5: The uniforming of the labels on the products improved customer understanding.
